commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm back!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Welcome back. How did it go?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The literary club, astronomy club, science club, and theater club are all okay with your conditions.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Really?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. We compromised on a lot of things, and I was able to get them to understand that you're thinking of what's best for everyone, too.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I am glad to hear that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But the basketball club and softball club still haven't agreed.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: However, they acknowledged how hard the student council works, and they came back with a compromise. See? Take a look.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Thank you very much.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's use this to try and find common ground.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. Just having them present their ideas to me like this is a huge step forward. Before, we were unable to even have a discussion.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We all want to make our school a better place. If you're sincere and patient with them, they'll be understanding.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If we can keep this up, I don't think we'll have to cancel the school tour.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. However, I'm surprised. I had no idea you were so good at coordinating things. I misread you. I owe you an apology.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? No way, that's not true at all.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: No, you should be proud.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Your talents should not be wasted in the school idol club. Why don't you join the student council and be my assistant?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you. I'm happy you hold me in such high regard, but I can't do that.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Why not? You seem very well-suited for the student council.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Just like there are things you can't concede, the school idol club is something I could never give up on.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want to support school idols. I want to be by their side. That is what I want to do.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see. However, I will not give up on you. If you ever change your mind, please let me know.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Got it.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Now then, thanks to you, it seems we will be able to hold the school tour. We must begin planning the program for the stage.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I have prepared this rough draft. Please take a look.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay. Oh, is this...?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Thank you for waiting.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry, I know we're late.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We just finished warming up.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: The school tour is coming up, so let's work hard again today!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, about that. I have some disappointing news.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I have a bad feeling. Rina-chan Board says, "Shudder."

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We only have time for one song during the school tour live show.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Whaaaaaat?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We were setting up the schedule for the school tour, but each club can only be allotted five minutes.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Five minutes? Rina-chan Board says, "Tear."

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Can't anything be done about that?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I wish I could do something after all the help you've given me, but I must remain impartial. I cannot give the school idol club any special treatment.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But I wanted to finally prove that I'm the best at making the crowd go wild. If no one else gets to go on stage, then we won't be able to compare.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, who said you'd get to be the one performing?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But if we had to pick one person to perform for all of us, it should be the cutest idol, don't you think?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No. I will win over the hearts of the prospective students with my love of school idols!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I think the students will be drawn to a school with a big sister like me who they can look up to. Shouldn't the most mature member of the club be the one to perform?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: No way. I was feeling really motivated for this!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, hey, I've been blowing up lately, you know. My five-second pun challenge video was a huge hit.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, well, I've also been posting videos called "Reading Before Bed," and I receive many messages about how relaxing they are!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I listen to those every night. Hearing you read out loud puts me to sleep in no time.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You're one of her fans, Kana?!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I tried challenging myself to sing 100 Japanese children's songs, and I'm almost at the end. Is it okay if I sing the 100th song on stage?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone's been working so hard on their own things. Knowing that makes picking just one of you even more impossible. What should I do?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Umm...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'd like to be the one to perform this time! Pick me, please!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: A-Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It's not like you to be this assertive, Ayumu.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, I'm very surprised.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see. She may be the best candidate for this.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: The school tour offers students a chance to see someplace where their new lives can start.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Ayumu's performance may demonstrate this perfectly because she hasn't been a school idol for very long and she earnestly strives to improve little by little.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hmm. I guess I see your point.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah. It's true that the students on the school tour will be new to the school. It might be good for them to see someone like themselves giving her all.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All right. Let's have Ayumu perform then. Is everyone okay with that?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Sounds good to me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Fine. Ayumu always gives me a strawberry from her parfait when we go to restaurants together, so I guess I can let her have this just this once.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: If our usually reserved Ayumu is so eager to do this, then all I can do is be a big sister to her and cheer her on.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thank you all so much!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's all give Ayumu our support!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
